titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 2244) to extend the termination date of the Terrorism Insurance Program established under the Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules; and providing for proceedings during the period from December 12, 2014, through January 3, 2015.

action.text: Resolution provides for consideration of S. 2244; provides suspension authority; and provides for proceedings through Jan. 3, 2015.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-654, by Mr. Sessions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 149.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 775.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 231 - 189 (Roll no. 554).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/9/2014--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (S. 2244) to extend the termination date of the Terrorism Insurance Program established under the Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules; and providing for proceedings during the period from December 12, 2014, through January 3, 2015.
